import React from 'react'; import MovieCard from './MovieCard'; import Loader from './Loader' import '../styles/Movielist.css' import '../styles/ResponsiveMovielist.css' const Movielist = (props) => { const scroll_left = () => { document.getElementById(props.id).scrollLeft += 1500; // see readme.md } const scroll_right = () => { document.getElementById(props.id).scrollLeft += -1500; // REDO } const img_url = "https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500" // api address for poster img return (
{props.title}

{props.isFetching && <>
} {!props.isFetching && props.movies.map((movie, i) => // SHOW MOVIE ONLY IF THERE IS AN IMAGE movie?.poster_path ? ( ) : null )}
) } export default Movielist
